metadata.title: AVHRR Sea Surface Temperatures of Northern Gulf of Alaska and Eastern Bering Sea
metadata.description:
Time series of hourly sea surface temperatures (SST) using the Advanced Very High Resolution Radiometer (AVHRR) sensor, which orbits the Earth approximately 14 times each day.  The images used are of one kilometer resolution.  Coverage area includes the northern Gulf of Alaska and eastern Bering Sea.


  A Sea-Air-Land Modeling and Observing Network (SALMON) Project.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To map sea surface temperatures.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: Hourly

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: Check with Source.
